articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Good Omens season 2 first trailer: Crowley and Aziraphale return - Polygon
articles.description: Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett’s 1990 book gets a sequel — in the form of a TV show. Good Omens season 2 brings back David Tennant’s Crowley and Michael Sheen’s Aziraphale for a brand new adventure.
articles.content: Crowely and Aziraphale hide an old friend
